Text.val: 14.03.2013 JH SCR17995 Replaced screen button load logic by GB901
22.03.2012 SH SCR17182 Replaced GM900 by GB900 (program permission)
13.05.2011 SH SCR16448 Replaced GNRL_CURRENCY by ADMN_CURRENCY
03.08.2005 AK SCR8456 Added combobox for exclude/Include corrections
02.05.2005 JJ SCR8256 added selection SCHT_BOOKED = 'Y' to where clause
05.04.2004 MW SCR#5144 --> changed the numeric picture of columns 3,5,7 in 9C
14.01.2004 JJ SC5214 added option include corections
S: Ok/Select, return last parked date (month) to parent

ExpSyntax.val: MlsTrans ('SCR[OSP004E]: Schedule overview totals per month')

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT cast(month(max(SCHT_SCHEDDATERECV)) as decimal (2,0)), MAX(SCHT_SCHEDDATERECV), cast(SUM( SCHT_TOTADEBTNOTESH) as decimal(18,2)), cast(SUM (SCHT_TOTNDEBTNOTES) as decimal(18)), cast( SUM (SCHT_TOTACREDNOTESH) as decimal (18,2)), cast( SUM (SCHT_TOTNCREDNOTES) as decimal(18)), cast(SUM (SCHT_TOTADEBTNOTESH - SCHT_TOTACREDNOTESH) as decimal (18,2)), cast(count(SCHT_NO) as decimal(18)) FROM :1/SCHT WHERE SCHT_SCHEDDATERECV BETWEEN ':2' AND ':3' :4 :5 AND SCHT_BOOKED='Y' GROUP BY month(SCHT_SCHEDDATERECV) ORDER BY 1

SELECT cast(sum( SCHT_TOTADEBTNOTESH) as decimal (18,2)), cast(sum(SCHT_TOTNDEBTNOTES) as decimal (18,2)), cast(sum(SCHT_TOTACREDNOTESH) as decimal (18,2)), cast(sum( SCHT_TOTNCREDNOTES) as decimal (18,2)), count(*) FROM :1/scht WHERE SCHT_SCHEDDATERECV BETWEEN ':2' and ':3' :4 :5
